title: Boots and the Seven Leaguers
description: Gog is just your average teenager. Sure, he's a troll, but he's got typical teen an irritating little brother, a best friend who's nothing but trouble, and no tickets to his favorite band's sold-out concert.There just might be a way to get into that concert, though.Magic . Now that's a sure way to get into trouble. . . .
author: Jane Yolen
